info.name: My movinhos API (ft-testing)
info.description: Collection to test the My movinhos API

request.description: Logs in as the default admin user.

exec: console.log("Newly Registered User ID: " + jsonData.id + ", Username: " + jsonData.username);

request.description: Logs in as the newly registered user to get a ROLE_USER token.

exec: console.log("Created Admin User ID: " + jsonData.id + ", Username: " + jsonData.username);

item.name: Get User by ID (Admin or Owner)
Get User by Username (Admin or Owner)

request.description: Requires a movie to be created first.
Needs user to have watched/favorited movies with genres.
Deletes the user created by admin earlier in the tests.

exec: console.log("Created Genre ID: " + jsonData.id + ", Name: " + jsonData.name);

request.description: This might fail if the genre is associated with a movie.
Ensure a genre (e.g., {{createdGenreName}}) exists before running.

exec: // This pre-request script ensures that the user has marked the movie as watched.
// This is a conceptual step; in a real test suite, you'd ensure this action was performed.
console.log("Pre-request: Ensure user {{newlyRegisteredUserId}} has watched movie {{createdMovieId}}.");
//      if (err || response.code !== 200) { console.error('Failed to mark movie as watched', err || response); }
//      else { console.log('Movie marked as watched successfully'); }

body.raw:
{
  "content": "This is a fantastic movie! Highly recommended. {{$randomInt}}",
  "directionScore": 5,
  "screenplayScore": 4,
  "cinematographyScore": 5,
  "generalScore": 5
}

request.description: Requires the user ({{newlyRegisteredUserId}}) to have 'watched' the movie ({{createdMovieId}}). You might need to run 'Mark Movie as Watched' first.

body.raw:
{
  "content": "Actually, after a rewatch, it's even better! {{$randomInt}}",
  "directionScore": 5,
  "screenplayScore": 5,
  "cinematographyScore": 5,
  "generalScore": 5
}

request.description: The @PreAuthorize uses @securityService.isReviewOwner. This implies the service checks if the authenticated user (from token) owns the review.
Admin user flags the review created by newlyRegisteredUser.

item.name: Get User Average Weighted Review Scores (Admin)
Get Watchlist by ID for User

request.description: Requires a movie ({{createdMovieId}}) to be created.
Requires reviews to be flagged. The `createdReviewId` from the Reviews folder could be used if it was flagged.
Uses the review created and potentially flagged earlier.
